# Pull Request Checklist

## Type of Change
- [ ] Feature (feat)
- [ ] Bug Fix (fix)
- [ ] Refactor (refactor)
- [ ] Documentation (docs)

## Verification
- [ ] I have run `npm run lint` and `npm run build` locally.
- [ ] I have run `pytest` locally.
- [ ] I have manually verified the changes in the browser (if UI related).

## Security & Governance
- [ ] My code follows the Project Structure (Canonical Paths).
- [ ] I have not committed any secrets or `.env` files.
- [ ] I have updated `CODEOWNERS` if I added new directories.
